doc.title: Derrick
doc.plot: Lost in a world of loneliness, Derrick, an emotionally unstable ex-marine, begins to obsess over the only person he has left, his ex-girlfriend Christine. However, Christine is struggling with moving on with her life and dealing with the complications of an unplanned pregnancy. Tensions rise when Derrick begins to aggressively stalk Christine at her job and home causing them to finally confront each other and their biggest fears.
